p: A study analyzed IGF-2 of 44 patients with NICTH, found that 31 patients had high levels of big IGF-2. Furthermore, the study was performed to determine the presence of IGF-2 in the tumors of 20 NICTH patients. Of those, high levels of big IGF-2 were found in the serum of 18 patients ( 10). These data indicate that hypoglycemia is affected by high molecular weight IGF-2, leading to the development of NITCH. The symptoms of preoperative hypoglycemia in this case may have been caused by IGF-2 in tumor cells.
